item.title: Delhi pollution: GRAP stage 3 kicks in as air quality deteriorates, know what all will be affected
item.description: Delhi pollution: GRAP stage 3 kicks in as air quality deteriorates, know what all will be affected Under GRAP stage 3, states may impose restrictions on the plying of BS III petrol and BS IV diesel four-wheelers in the NCR.

item.title: India vs Netherlands T20 head to head records: IND vs NED head to head in T20 history
item.description: India vs Netherlands T20 head to head records: IND vs NED head to head in T20 history India vs Netherlands T20 head to head: The SportsRush presents for you the Head to Head statistics for IND vs NED T20 World Cup match.

item.title: Gujarat: PM Narendra Modi’s meet with Patidar leader sets tongues wagging
item.description: Gujarat: PM Narendra Modi’s meet with Patidar leader sets tongues wagging Ahmedabad: Amid speculation that Prime Minister Narendra Modi may visit influential Patidar organisations on Sardar Patel’s birth anniversary on October 31 in a renewed bid to win over the community, Naresh Patel, Chairman of the Shree Khodaldham Trust, met him at his residence in New Delhi on Saturday evening.

item.title: Gujarat BJP targets Kejriwal over cracker ban in Delhi
item.description: Gujarat BJP targets Kejriwal over cracker ban in Delhi Rajkot: Gujarat BJP chief C R Paatil has hit out at Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal over his government’s decision to completely ban firecrackers in the national capital, and dubbed such people “anti-religious” who were stopping citizens from celebrating their festivals.
